result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Case called: 3:37 pm
INCLUDES 15CF109 AND 15CF149.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Molly Lawrence:
Defendant appears in custody and with Atty Gerald Hersil;
VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to:
15CF109:
Ct. 3 (Criminal Damage to Property-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 4 (Criminal Damage to Property-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 5 (Theft-Movable Property-Repeater)>>DRI.

15CF149:
Ct. 1 (Forgery-Uttering-PTAC)>>DRI.
COURT GRANTS ABOVE.

PLEA:
15CF109:
Ct. 1 (Buglary-Building or Dwelling-Repeater)>> NO CONTEST.
Ct. 2 (Criminal Damage to Property-Repeater)>> NO CONTEST.

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
15CF109:
Ct. 1 (Buglary-Building or Dwelling-Repeater)>> 6 Years WSPS, 3 Years IC and 3 Years ES, Concurrent. CONDITIONS: Restitution in the amount of $4,934.98 to be paid, Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination and when not fully engaged must complete 15 Hours of Community Service per week, No Contact with St. John's Lutheran Church or Covantage Credit Union, Counseling as recommended, Court Costs, DNA Sample and Surcharge. Court finds 36 days credit. Defendant is eligible for programming.

Ct. 2 (Criminal Damage to Property-Repeater)>>  2 Years WSPS, 1 Years IC and 1 Years ES, Concurrent. CONDITIONS: Restitution in the amount of $4,934.98 to be paid, Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination and when not fully engaged must complete 15 Hours of Community Service per week, No Contact with St. John's Lutheran Church or CoVantage Credit Union, Counseling as recommended, Court Costs, DNA Sample and Surcharge. Court finds 36 days credit. Defendant is eligible for programming.

Court Signs Restitution Order.
REMANDED TO WSPS.
